price: Ijapo kuwa itawajia kila Ishara, mpaka waione adhabu iliyo chungu.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
footnotes: Na ukiwajia na kila hoja, na iwe wazi vipi, hawakinaiki. Wataendelea tu na upotovu wao mpaka wamalizikie kupata adhabu chungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
